products.name: Tabi Boots
products.description: Signature tabi boots with split toe design. Iconic Maison Margiela footwear that redefines traditional Japanese tabi socks.

products.name: Oversized Blazer
products.description: Deconstructed blazer with oversized fit. Raw edges and exposed seams showcase the brand's signature deconstruction aesthetic.

products.name: GAT Sneakers
products.description: German Army Trainers in white leather. Minimalist design with premium materials and exceptional craftsmanship.

products.name: Deconstructed Trench
products.description: Asymmetric trench coat with raw edges. A modern interpretation of classic outerwear with avant-garde details.

products.name: 5AC Bag
products.description: Minimalist crossbody bag. Clean lines and functional design with premium leather construction.

products.name: Replica Sneakers
products.description: Vintage-inspired sneakers with aged effect. Distressed leather and worn-in aesthetic for a lived-in look.

products.name: Oversized Shirt
products.description: Deconstructed shirt with raw seams. Relaxed fit with signature Maison Margiela deconstruction details.

products.name: Memory Card Holder
products.description: Minimalist card holder in leather. Compact design with multiple card slots and premium construction.

products.name: Paint Splatter Sneakers
products.description: Artistic sneakers with paint splatter effect. Unique hand-painted details make each pair one-of-a-kind.

products.name: Deconstructed Jeans
products.description: Raw edge jeans with exposed seams. Distressed denim with avant-garde construction techniques.

products.name: Memory Card Wallet
products.description: Sleek wallet with card slots. Premium leather construction with minimalist design and functional organization.

products.name: Oversized Sweater
products.description: Deconstructed knit with raw edges. Oversized silhouette with exposed seams and avant-garde details.
